channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Packing on corners, 17th April
item.description:
This is happening more and more, those cars have no regard for other people that live in the street. This makes it very difficult for myself and neighbours to get off our driveway due to the way they are parking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Boleyn Close, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
After traffic lights in centre
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sudeley House Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pitholes on Bibury road also road damaged on junction out of sheepscombe close, 16th April
item.description:
Large potholes down Bibury road just to the left of Sheepscombe Close forcing cars to drive all over the road to avoid also road surface damage to the entrance to Sheepscombe Close has potholes have been there for at least 2 months and have seen cars swerving to avoid which is dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Bibury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smyths trolley in Clevedon Square, 16th April
item.description:
I think Smith has gone out of business so itâ€™s probably time just to take this to the recycling centre. Please collect this trolley.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 Clevedon Square, Cheltenham

item.title: Deepening pothole/s, 16th April
item.description:
Pothole/s now formed in previously reported collapsing gutter on A40 eastbound next to ingress to Nazareth House and traffic island. Given you have white ringed potholes near this section, perhaps you could repair it at same time, please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 197 London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter and rubbish in undergrowth adjacent to path, 16th April
item.description:
This is in the back lane between Caernarvon Park and Long Mynd Avenue. I think the hedges have been cut back, which as a result has revealed a lot of quite old looking litter, bottles, small flytipping etc.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 28 Long Mynd Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Restaurant fly tipping on pavement, 16th April
item.description:
These restaurants consistently block the pavement with overflowing bins which look unsightly, smell, and attract rats.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 18 New Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lamps shining through windows overnight, 16th April
item.description:
Bright Street lamps shine through windows of the houses on this street overnight. Deflectors on the lights would prevent them shining through windows. It's been a problem since installed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Overbrook Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 32 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Mega pothole from roundabout to petrol station, 15th April
item.description:
The road has disintegrated and potholes or rather a crater stretches from the roundabout to the petrol station. Some of it is so deep that it probably about 20 to 30cm deep. This has been an issue for at least 4 months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Hine Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
